remarks: Reversal of a finite sum.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2014.)
statement:
fsumrev.1 $e |- ( ph -> K e. ZZ ) $.
fsumrev.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
fsumrev.3 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ZZ ) $.
fsumrev.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ j e. ( M ... N ) ) -> A e. CC ) $.
fsumrev.5 $e |- ( j = ( K - k ) -> A = B ) $.
fsumrev $p |- ( ph -> sum_ j e. ( M ... N ) A = sum_ k e. ( ( K - N ) ... ( K - M ) ) B ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B j $.
$d K j k $.
$d M j k $.
$d N j k $.
$d j k ph $.
